friends-invite-modal.heading: Gayyaci abokai
friends-invite-modal.description: Gayyaci abokan ka zuwa zaman tattaunawa wanda kowa zai iya ganin amsar wani a lokacin da ake yi.

name.label: Sunan ku / laƙabi
name.description: Yi haƙuri ku sanya sunan ku saboda abokanan ku su iya gane ku. Zaku iya kuma amfani da laƙabi.

introduction.heading: Menene zama yaɗaɗɗe?
explanation: Zama yaɗaɗɗe na baku damar samun sanin komfas ɗin zaɓe tare da abokanan ku. Mutum ɗaya ya gayyaci wasu zuwa yaɗaɗɗen zama. A sanda duk kowa ya shiga, zaku iya kowa yayi amfani da komfas na zaɓen kamar yadda kuka saba yi. Amma ga ƙarin adadi da aka samu, zaku iya ganin amsoshin junan ku kuma ku tattauna.

security.heading: Shin amsoshi na nada aminci?
explanation: Ee! Amsoshin ku ana rabawa tsakanin ku kai tsaye akan na'urorin ku ta hanyar wata alaƙa tsararriya. Server na taimakawa na'urori su nema junan su a intanet - amsoshin ku. Amma dai, bawai ana aikawa ta server ɗin bane, sai dai kai tsaye ne daga na'ura zuwa na'ura.

registration.heading: Shin ina buƙatar inyi rijista dan amfani da samfur ɗin?
explanation: Ba'a buƙatar yin rijista. Abun da zaka yi shine sanya sunan ka kawai zaka iya shiga zaman.

friends-join-modal.heading: Shiga cikin abokai
friends-join-modal.description: Yi alaƙa da abokai a yaɗaɗɗen zama kuma ku ga amsoshin kowa a zahiri.

name.label: Sunan ku / laƙabi
name.description: Yi hakuri ku sanya sunan ku saboda abokanan ku su iya gane ku. Zaku iya kuma amfani da laƙabi.

join.label: Na'urar aboki
join.description: Shiga yaɗaɗɗen zama ta sanya ID na na'urar duk wanda yake ɗaukar nauyin zama.

introduction.heading: Menene zama yaɗaɗɗe?
explanation: Zama yaɗaɗɗe na baku damar samun sanin komfas ɗin zaɓen tare da abokanan ku. Mutum ɗaya ya gayyaci wasu zuwa yaɗaɗɗen zaman. A sanda dukka kowa ya shiga, zaku iya kowa yayi amfani da komfas na zaɓen kamar yadda kuka saba yi. Amma ga ƙarin adadi da aka samu, zaku iya ganin amsoshin junan ku kuma ku tattaunawa.

security.heading: Shin amsoshi na nada tsaro?
explanation: Ee! Amsoshin ku ana rabawa tsakanin ku kai tsaye akan na'urorin ku ta hanyar wata alaƙa tsararre. Server na taimaka wa na'urorin su nema junan su a intanet - amsoshin ku. Amma dai, bawai ana aikawa ta server ɗin bane, sai dai kai tsaye ne daga na'ura zuwa na'ura.

registration.heading: Shin ina buƙatar inyi rijista dan amfani da samfur ɗin?
explanation: Ba'a buƙatar yin rijista. Abun da zaka yi shine sanya sunan ka kawai zaka iya shiga zaman.

friends-list.heading: Na'urorin da suke ciki
friends-list.empty: Mai ɗaukar nauyin zaman na buƙatar yarda da shigar ku na zaman.

INACTIVE.heading: Ba'a da alaƙa
INACTIVE.text: Baku da alaƙa zuwa ga kowa. Shiga zaman dake aukuwa ko ku ɗauki nauyin zaman ku ta babban jadawali.

GUEST.heading: Baƙo
GUEST.text: Kuna kasancewa cikin zama yaɗaɗɗe, wanda wani ke ɗaukar nauyi.

HOST.heading: Mai ɗaukar nauyi
HOST.text: Kai ne mai ɗaukar nauyin wannan zaman. Gayyaci abokanan ku ta amfani da ID na na'urar ku da yarda da buƙatar su shiga.

own-peer-id.label: Na'uarar ku
own-peer-id.description: Wannan ne ID na na'urar ku. Abokan ku na buƙatar sanya ta a na'urar su dan samun shiga wannan yaɗaɗɗen zaman.

guests-list.heading: Na'uarar dake alaƙa
guests-list.empty: Babu wanda ya shigo zaman har yanzu.

kiosk-mode.heading: Shin zamu sake saiti?
kiosk-mode.description: Komfas na zaɓen za'a sake saitin shi yanzu kuma dukkan amsoshin ku zasu goge. | Komfas na zaɓen za'a sake saita shi daƙiƙoƙi {count} kuma dukkan amsoshin zasu goge. | Komfas na zaɓen zai sake saiti a daƙiƙoƙi {count} kuma dukkan amsoshin zasu goge.

language-switch.heading: Yaruka
language-switch.description: Yi haƙuri zaɓi yaren da kuka fi so.

important-button.important-aria: Muhimmi – sanya wannan bayani amatsayin muhimmi gare ka.
important-button.too-many-important: Akwai kawai sanarwa kaɗan ne, dan haka ba zaka iya sanya ɗaya amatsayin muhimmi ba. | Yi haƙuri sanya kada ya wuce ɗaya na sanarwan amatsayin muhimmi dan samun sakamako mai ma'ana! | Yi haƙuri sanya sanarwa kada ya wuce {count} amatsayin muhimmi dan samun sakamako mai ma'ana!

skip-button.skip-aria: Tsallake – tsallake wannan sanarwan saboda ba za'a ƙirga ta ba.
skip-button.too-many-skip: Akwai kawai sanarwa kaɗan ne, dan haka ba zaka iya tsallake ɗaya ba. | Yi hakuri tsallake kada ya wuce ɗaya na sanarwan dan samun sakamako mai ma'ana! | Yi haƙuri tsallake sanarwa kada ya wuce {count} dan samun sakamako mai ma'ana!

statement-badge.important-aria: Ka sanya wannan sanarwan amatsayin muhimmi.

party-item.party-aria: Jam'iyya '{party}' – latsa nan dan zaɓa ko kin zaɓan wannan jam'iyya dan kwatantawa.

section.heading: Zaɓi jam'iyyun da kuke son kwatantawa
section.instruction: Yi haƙuri zaɓi jam'iyyu da kuke son kwatantawa na naku shawarar. Zaku iya zaɓan jam'iyyu da yawa da kuke so, amma sai dai ku zaɓi a ƙalla guda biyu. Waɗannan jerin masu zuwa an gabatar da sune a tsari iri ɗaya kamar yadda jam'iyyun zasu fito a takardan ƙuri'a.

match-display.match-aria: Haɗin ku na jam'iyya '{party}' yana a {percentage} %

section.heading: Sakamakon ku
section.explanation: Wannan taswira yana bayyana yawan yadda kai da wasu ƴan jam'iyyu kuka yarda akan abubuwan nan. Yawan yadda kason yake, hakane yawan yadda muƙaman suka daidaita. Sa aran ka, wannan ba buƙatan zaɓe bane, amma abin aiki ne na wayar da kai da tattaunawa.

additional-analysis.heading: Ƙididdiga
additional-analysis.start: Mun gode da yadawa! Bayanan ku ya zamo mai ƙarin daraja ga ƙididdigan idan kuka bayyana karin bayana akan ku – zaku taimaka da ƙarin haka? kawai amsa tambaya da yawa da kuke so!
additional-analysis.help-even-more: Mun gode sosai! Kuna son taimakawa sosai kuma? Zaku iya amsa tambayoyi sosai da kuke so anan:
additional-analysis.thanks: Mun gode da yadawa! Wadancan sune dukka tambayoyin – kun taimaka mana sosai! Danna 'Fita' ku koma baya ga sakamakon ku.

age.name: Shekara
age.label: Nawa shekarar ka yanzu?
age.description: Shekarar ka na da muhimmanci ga binciken sanin me mutane a mabanbantan shekaru suke gani akan wadannan jam'iyoyi.

education.name: Matakan cancanta
education.label: Menene mafi nisan matakin karatun ka?

party.name: Jam'iyya
party.label: Idan zaɓen yau ne, waye zaka kaɗa wa ƙuri'ar ka?

analysis-banner.heading: Shin kana son bada amsar ga kimiyya?
analysis-banner.explanation: Zaka iya taimakawa {someone} ya fahimci wannan zaɓen sosai ta tallafar da amsoshin ka ga binciken kimiyya. Muna kawai adana bayanai ne a boye da ba za'a iya mayarwa gare ka ba.

skip.content: Jam'iyya '{party}' bata bada wani amsa ba ko mataki akan wannan sanarwan.

empty.content: Jam'iyya '{party}' bata bada wani tunani ba ko matakin ta akan wannan sanarwan.

section.heading: Amsoshin su
section.explanation: Jam'iyyu sukan bada matsayan su ga kowane sanarwa dan bayyana tunanin su. Ba koda yaushe ne yake a buɗe ba me yasa jam'iyya take ɗaukar wani mataki shiyasa ake son karanta wannan sanarwan ko muradan zaɓukan su.

kiosk-mode-hint.heading: Yi haƙuri ka sake saiti idan ka gama
kiosk-mode-hint.explanation: Ɗauki lokacin ka ka karanta da gwama amsoshin sanarwan dake kasa. Sanda ka gama, zaka iya sake saita komfas na zaɓen anan dan mutum na gaba. Wannan kuma zai goge naka amsoshin. Haske: zaka iya samun maɓallin sake saiti a jadawali. Na gode!

section.explanation: Wannan komfas ɗin zaɓen anyi shi ne akan manhaja ta kyauta {0}.

name.regex: Baƙaƙe kawai, lambobi da sarare, banda alamomi masu muhimmanci.

strongly-approve.button-aria: Na aminta sosai – danna nan dan amincewa sosai da wannan sanarwa!
strongly-approve.badge-aria: Ka aminta sosai da wannan sanarwa.
strongly-approve.answer-aria: Jam'iyya '{party}' ta aminta sosai da wannan sanarwa tare da waɗannan amsoshin: {answer}

approve.button-aria: Amincewa – danna nan ka amince da wannan sanrwat!
approve.answer-aria: Jam'iyya '{party}' ta aminta sosai da wannan sanarwa tare da waɗannan amsoshin: {answer}

neutral.button-aria: Tsaka tsaki – danna nan ka cigaba da zama a tsaka tsaki akan wannan sanarwa!
neutral.badge-aria: Kai a tsaka tsaki kake akan wannan sanarwan.
neutral.answer-aria: Jam'iyya '{party}' ta tsaya a tsaka tsaki ga wannan sanarwa, da bada waɗannan amsar: {answer}

partly.button-aria: Mafi yawa – danna nan ka yarda da mafi yawan wannan sanarwan!
partly.badge-aria: Ka yarda da mafi yawan wannan sanarwan.
partly.answer-aria: Jam'iyya '{party}' ta goyi bayan mafi yawa na wannan sanarwa, da bayar da wannan amsa: {answer}

reject.button-aria: Ƙi – danna nan ka ƙi amincewa da wannan sanarwan!
reject.answer-aria: Jam'iyya '{party}' ta ƙi wannan sanarwan tare da wannan amsa: {answer}

strongly-reject.button-aria: Ƙi sosai – danna nan ka ƙi wannan sanarwan sosai!
strongly-reject.answer-aria: Jam'iyya '{party}' ta ƙi wannan sanarwan tare da wannan amsar: {answer}
